outputs.output_descr: The intended output of the Pacific SGP is to provide cost effective support for community development initiatives promoting environmental protection, eliminating poverty elimination, and sustaining livelihoods and strengthening individual and institutional capacities undertaking these initiatives.

project_descr: The regional project will support community-based activities for environmental protection with direct contribution to poverty elimination and sustainable livelihoods.
project_title: Global Environment Facility Small Grants Programme
